name: @siteimprove/alfa
description: Suite of open and standards-based tools for performing reliable accessibility conformance testing at scale

scripts.#coverage:comment: We use --coverage.enabled instead of --coverage to allow overriding options in the CLI. See warning at https://vitest.dev/config/#coverage
scripts.#coverage:package:comment: Run coverage for a single package. Usage: yarn coverage:package packages/alfa-foo. We don't rebuild the project, so make sure to run `yarn build` first.
scripts.#coverage:package:comment-magic: See https://yarnpkg.com/getting-started/qa/#how-to-share-scripts-between-workspaces for yarn magic.
